verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Avenge|strong="H5358"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* of the \w Midianites|strong="H4084"\w*: \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* shalt thou be \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* unto thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Arm|strong="H2502"\w* \w some|strong="H0582"\w* of yourselves unto the \w war|strong="H6635"\w*, and let them go against the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*, and \w avenge|strong="H5414"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*.

Of every \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, throughout all the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, shall ye \w send|strong="H7971"\w* to the \w war|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 31.4 \ft Of…: Heb. A thousand of a tribe, a thousand of a tribe\f*

So there were \w delivered|strong="H4560"\w* out of the \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* of \add every\add* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* for \w war|strong="H6635"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* them to the \w war|strong="H6635"\w*, a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* of \add every\add* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*, them and \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, to the \w war|strong="H6635"\w*, with the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w*, and the \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* to \w blow|strong="H8643"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And they \w warred|strong="H6633"\w* against the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*; and they \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* all the \w males|strong="H2145"\w*.

And they \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* the rest of them that were \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*; \add namely\add*, \w Evi|strong="H0189"\w*, and \w Rekem|strong="H7552"\w*, and \w Zur|strong="H6698"\w*, and \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, and \w Reba|strong="H7254"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*: \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* also the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w* they \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* took \add all\add* the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w captives|strong="H7617"\w*, and their little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, and took the \w spoil|strong="H0962"\w* of all their \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, and all their \w flocks|strong="H4735"\w*, and all their \w goods|strong="H2428"\w*.
And they \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* all their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* wherein they \w dwelt|strong="H4186"\w*, and all their goodly \w castles|strong="H2918"\w*, with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.
And they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*, and all the \w prey|strong="H4455"\w*, \add both\add* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w* and of \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*.

And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w captives|strong="H7628"\w*, and the \w prey|strong="H4455"\w*, and the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*, unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and unto the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, unto the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* at the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, which \add are\add* by \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \add near\add* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and all the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* them \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* was \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w* with the \w officers|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w host|strong="H2428"\w*, \add with\add* the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, which \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H6635"\w* the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 31.14 \ft battle: Heb. host of war\f*
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Have ye \w saved|strong="H2421"\w* all the \w women|strong="H5347"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*?

Behold, \w these|strong="H2007"\w* \w caused|strong="H1961"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, through the \w counsel|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, to \w commit|strong="H4560"\w* \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Peor|strong="H6465"\w*, and there was a \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* among the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Now therefore \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* every \w male|strong="H2145"\w* among the little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, and \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* every \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that hath \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* by \w lying|strong="H4904"\w* with \w him|strong="H2145"\w*.\f + \fr 31.17 \ft him: Heb. a male\f*

But all the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w*, that have not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* a \w man|strong="H2145"\w* by \w lying|strong="H4904"\w* with him, keep \w alive|strong="H2421"\w* for yourselves.

And do ye \w abide|strong="H2583"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: whosoever hath \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* any \w person|strong="H5315"\w*, and whosoever hath \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* any \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* \add both\add* yourselves and your \w captives|strong="H7628"\w* on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* all \add your\add* \w raiment|strong="H0899"\w*, and all that is \w made|strong="H3627"\w* of \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, and all \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of \w goats’|strong="H5795"\w* \add hair\add*, and all things \w made|strong="H3627"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.\f + \fr 31.20 \ft that…: Heb. instrument, or, vessel of skins\f*

¶ And \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H6635"\w* which \w went|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*;

Only the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, the \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, the \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, the \w tin|strong="H0913"\w*, and the \w lead|strong="H5777"\w*,

Every \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that may \w abide|strong="H0935"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, ye shall make \add it\add* go \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and it shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*: nevertheless it shall be \w purified|strong="H2398"\w* with the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w separation|strong="H5079"\w*: and all that \w abideth|strong="H0935"\w* not the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* ye shall make go \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

And ye shall \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* your \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w* on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and ye shall be \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*, and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* ye shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* the \w sum|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w prey|strong="H4455"\w* that was \w taken|strong="H7628"\w*, \add both\add* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and of \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, thou, and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*:\f + \fr 31.26 \ft that…: Heb. of the captivity\f*

And \w divide|strong="H2673"\w* the \w prey|strong="H4455"\w* into two \w parts|strong="H2673"\w*; between them that \w took|strong="H8610"\w* the \w war|strong="H4421"\w* upon them, who went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w battle|strong="H6635"\w*, and between all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*:

And \w levy|strong="H7311"\w* a \w tribute|strong="H4371"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* which went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w battle|strong="H6635"\w*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, \add both\add* of the \w persons|strong="H0120"\w*, and of the \w beeves|strong="H1241"\w*, and of the \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, and of the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*:

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \add it\add* of their \w half|strong="H4276"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it unto \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \add for\add* an heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel’s|strong="H3478"\w* \w half|strong="H4276"\w*, thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w portion|strong="H0270"\w* of \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, of the \w persons|strong="H0120"\w*, of the \w beeves|strong="H1241"\w*, of the \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, and of the \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, of all manner of \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, which \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 31.30 \ft flocks: or, goats\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And the \w booty|strong="H4455"\w*, \add being\add* the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w prey|strong="H0957"\w* which the men \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w* had \w caught|strong="H0962"\w*, was \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*,
And threescore and \w twelve|strong="H7657"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w beeves|strong="H1241"\w*,
And \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*,

And \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w persons|strong="H5315"\w* in \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, of \w women|strong="H0802"\w* that had not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w man|strong="H2145"\w* by \w lying|strong="H4904"\w* with him.

And the \w half|strong="H4275"\w*, \add which was\add* the \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* of them that went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w*, was in \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*:

And the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w tribute|strong="H4371"\w* of the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* was \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and threescore and \w fifteen|strong="H7657"\w*.

And the \w beeves|strong="H1241"\w* \add were\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*; of which the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w tribute|strong="H4371"\w* \add was\add* threescore and \w twelve|strong="H7657"\w*.

And the \w asses|strong="H2543"\w* \add were\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*; of which the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w tribute|strong="H4371"\w* \add was\add* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w*.

And the \w persons|strong="H0120"\w* \add were\add* \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*; of which the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w tribute|strong="H4371"\w* \add was\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w persons|strong="H5315"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w tribute|strong="H4371"\w*, \add which was\add* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w*, unto \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel’s|strong="H3478"\w* \w half|strong="H4276"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w divided|strong="H2673"\w* from the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w warred|strong="H6633"\w*,

(Now the \w half|strong="H4275"\w* \add that pertained unto\add* the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* was \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add and\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w sheep|strong="H4480"\w*,
And \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w beeves|strong="H1241"\w*,
And \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w asses|strong="H2543"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*,
And \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w persons|strong="H5315"\w*;)

Even of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel’s|strong="H3478"\w* \w half|strong="H4276"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w portion|strong="H0270"\w* of \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, \add both\add* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and of \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, which \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And the \w officers|strong="H6485"\w* which \add were\add* over \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, came \w near|strong="H7126"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*:

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* have \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* the \w sum|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* which \add are\add* under our \w charge|strong="H3027"\w*, and there \w lacketh|strong="H6485"\w* not one \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of us.\f + \fr 31.49 \ft charge: Heb. hand\f*

We have therefore \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* an \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w* for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, what every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w gotten|strong="H4672"\w*, of \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w chains|strong="H0685"\w*, and \w bracelets|strong="H6781"\w*, \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*, \w earrings|strong="H5694"\w*, and \w tablets|strong="H3558"\w*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for our \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 31.50  t gotten: Heb. found *

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* of them, \add even\add* all \w wrought|strong="H4639"\w* \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w*.

And all the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* of the \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* that they offered \w up|strong="H7311"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, of the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, and of the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, was \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*.\f + \fr 31.52 \ft offering: Heb. heave offering\f*
(\add For\add* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H6635"\w* had taken \w spoil|strong="H0962"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* for himself.)

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* of the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* and of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* it into the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, \add for\add* a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
